com.analog.lyric.dimple.factorfunctions.core

Class FactorTableEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.dimple.factorfunctions.core.FactorTableEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @Immutable
public final class FactorTableEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Holds the information for one factor table entry from a IFactorTableIterator
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
